name: Fururu Project : Ruby
description: 《 Fururu Project : Ruby 》 is an adventure game (AVG). The game focuses on interactions with objects in scenes and exploring through the map. Players are able to trigger various events in game and affect how the story goes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U  2.50GHz Graphics: with DX10 (shader model 4.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
